channel.title: Looking for Advertisers! [New Spawn] Absolute-PK [New Spawn]
channel.description:
[b]I am looking for advertisers for my server. We are using the same source as RecklessPk / Instantpk. I know the owner irl and we share the same developers etc. This is a new project so all help is needed! Contact me for more info!
Skype: rafr200[/b]
Server is online and has 10 players online daily! But we are new so we are still looking for active staff or moderators!
[img]http://absolutepk.com/threadimg/banner-new.gif[/img]

item.title: Looking for Advertisers! [New Spawn] Absolute-PK [New Spawn]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

This isn’t what the section is for. We do have a status page where you can advertise your server.

Read full topic
